Description: Information on local authority owned vacant stock is collected form each local authority through the Housing Statistics Annual Return. Local authority dwellings can be vacant for a variety of reasons, such as being part of a planned disposal or modernisation/repair programme, or in low demand areas.  Figures on vacant dwellings are broken down by reason for vacancy, and length of time the property has been vacant.
Name: Local Authority Vacant Stock
Notes: Figures on vacant dwellings are broken down by reason for vacancy, and length of time the property has been vacant. This information has been provided from 1998 to 2019.  It is possible that this spreadsheet will be replaced on this landing page however it might be better to confirm this with the producer for ongoing publications.
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified as  'Housing Statistics for Scotland - Public sector vacant stock' an XLS spreadsheet can be found in the table under File.
Sizing Notes: Simple table structure. Multiple tables on each tab but simple dimensions.  The final table is not required as it is a summary table which uses a V-lookup
